titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3630) to provide incentives for the creation of jobs, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3630) to provide incentives for the creation of jobs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-328, by Mr. Dreier.
All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived. The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying the resolution shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 99.

action.text: By direction of the Committee on Rules, Mr. Dreier called up H.Res. 491 and asked for its immediate consideration.

POINT OF ORDER - Ms. Moore raised a point of order against the provisions of H.Res. 491 on the grounds that it violated section 426-A of the Congressional Budget Act. The Chair announced that the disposition of the point of order would be resolved by the question of consideration of H.Res. 491. The House proceeded with 20 minutes of debate on the point of order at the end of which the Chair will put the question on consideration of the resolution.
On question of consideration of the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 174 (Roll no. 917).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 491.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 236 - 182 (Roll no. 918).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 180 (Roll no. 919).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3630) to provide incentives for the creation of jobs.
